forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In the quiet hours of the night, Downtown San Francisco rests under a canopy of mostly cloudy skies, the temperature hovering gently at around 54 degrees. A soft breath of wind from the west southwest stirs the cool air, promising a fresh dawn. As Friday unfolds, the clouds will begin to part, allowing glimpses of sun to dance playfully above the city, only to fade again as afternoon approaches, with temperatures settling near 61 degrees. The refreshing breeze will accompany you throughout the day, with gusts hinting at the coolness that characterizes this vibrant coastal abode.

Though the early morning mist may linger in some corners, lending an ethereal quality to the city's iconic skyline, the gradual unveiling of the sun offers the promise of a pleasant day ahead. For those venturing out, light layers are advisable—perhaps a well-fitted sweater or light jacket paired with breathable fabrics, to adapt as the sun casts its warm embrace. Today beckons a leisurely exploration—strolling along the Embarcadero or perhaps indulging in a quiet moment at one of the inviting local cafes, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles effortlessly with the crisp air, making for an enjoyable experience amid the city's soft, shifting light.
